join hortbot 999 foobar 1

handle hortbot @id=__UUID__;room-id=1;user-id=1 :foobar!foobar@foobar.tmi.twitch.tv PRIVMSG #foobar :+p
send hortbot #foobar [HB] usage: +p <user>

handle hortbot @id=__UUID__;room-id=1;user-id=1 :foobar!foobar@foobar.tmi.twitch.tv PRIVMSG #foobar :++p
no_send

handle hortbot @id=__UUID__;room-id=1;user-id=1 :foobar!foobar@foobar.tmi.twitch.tv PRIVMSG #foobar :-p
no_send

handle hortbot @id=__UUID__;room-id=1;user-id=1 :foobar!foobar@foobar.tmi.twitch.tv PRIVMSG #foobar :+p random
send hortbot #foobar /timeout random 1
send hortbot #foobar [HB] random's chat history has been purged.

handle hortbot @id=__UUID__;room-id=1;user-id=3 :what!what@what.tmi.twitch.tv PRIVMSG #foobar :+p someone
no_send

handle hortbot @id=__UUID__;room-id=1;user-id=3;subscriber=1 :what!what@what.tmi.twitch.tv PRIVMSG #foobar :+p someone
no_send
